import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { Home, Receipt, BarChart3, Wallet, Bell, User, Settings, LogOut, Plus } from "lucide-react"; import '../../styles/Sidebar.css'; const Sidebar = ({ onLogout, user, isMobileOpen, onMobileClose }) => { return (
{/* Logo */}
ExpenseTrack
{/* Primary Action */} {/* Navigation */}
`nav-item ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Dashboard `nav-item ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Expenses `nav-item ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Reports `nav-item ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Budgets
{/* Bottom Section */}
{/* User Profile Section */}
{user?.name || 'User'} {user?.email || 'user@example.com'}
`nav-item ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Profile
); }; export default Sidebar;
